summary.span: 对模块执行反射。

span.span: Performs reflection on a module.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 模块是可移植的可执行文件，例如 type.dll 或 application.exe，由一个或多个类和接口组成。A module is a portable executable file, such as type.dll or application.exe, consisting of one or more classes and interfaces. 单个模块可包含多个命名空间，而一个命名空间可跨越多个模块。There may be multiple namespaces contained in a single module, and a namespace may span multiple modules. 作为一个单元部署的一个或多个模块组成一个程序集。One or more modules deployed as a unit compose an assembly. 有关创建包含多个模块的程序集的信息，请参阅多 [文件程序集](/dotnet/framework/app-domains/multifile-assemblies)。For information about creating an assembly with more than one module, see [Multifile Assemblies](/dotnet/framework/app-domains/multifile-assemblies). 请注意，.NET Framework 模块与 Visual Basic 中的模块不同，程序员使用它在应用程序中组织函数和子例程。Note that a .NET Framework module is not the same as a module in Visual Basic, which is used by a programmers to organize functions and subroutines in an application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用反射来获取有关模块的信息：The following code examples show how to use reflection to get information about modules: [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Module#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Module/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Module#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Module/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个特殊的类加载异常。 is a special class load exception. `ReflectionTypeLoadException.Types`属性包含已在模块中定义并加载的类的数组。The `ReflectionTypeLoadException.Types` property contains the array of classes that were defined in the module and were loaded. 此数组可能包含一些 null 值。This array may contain some null values. `ReflectionTypeLoadException.LoaderExceptions`属性是一个异常数组，表示由类加载程序引发的异常。The `ReflectionTypeLoadException.LoaderExceptions` property is an array of exceptions that represent the exceptions that were thrown by the class loader. 类数组中的孔与异常一起排列。The holes in the class array line up with the exceptions. 给定的委托 `filter` 针对模块中的每个类进行调用，同时传递 `Type` 表示类的对象以及给定的 `filterCriteria` 。The delegate given by `filter` is called for each class in the module, passing along the `Type` object representing the class as well as the given `filterCriteria`. 如果 `filter` 返回特定类，则该类将包含在返回的数组中。If `filter` returns a particular class, that class will be included in the returned array. 如果 `filter` 返回 `null` ，则返回并忽略所有类 `filterCriteria` 。If `filter` returns `null`, all classes are returned and `filterCriteria` is ignored. `FindTypes` 不能用于查找参数化类型（如数组）。`FindTypes` cannot be used to look up parameterized types such as arrays. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `FindTypes` 方法。The following example demonstrates the `FindTypes` method. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Module.FilterTypeName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Module.FilterTypeName Example/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Module.FilterTypeName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Module.FilterTypeName Example/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Module.FilterTypeName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Module.FilterTypeName Example/VB/class1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果已将该类型转发给另一个程序集，则此方法仍将返回该程序集。If the type has been forwarded to another assembly, it is still returned by this method. 有关类型转发的信息，请参阅 [公共语言运行时中的类型转发](/dotnet/standard/assembly/type-forwarding)。For information on type forwarding, see [Type Forwarding in the Common Language Runtime](/dotnet/standard/assembly/type-forwarding). 可以使用从特定模块中检索类型 。A type can be retrieved from a specific module using . 对包含清单的模块调用将不会搜索整个程序集。Calling on the module that contains the manifest will not search the entire assembly. 若要从程序集中检索某一类型，而不考虑它所在的模块，则必须调用 。To retrieve a type from an assembly, regardless of which module it is in, you must call . ## Examples 下面的示例显示指定模块中的类型的名称。The following example displays the name of a type in the specified module. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Module.GetType 1Arg Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Module.GetType 1Arg Example/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Module.GetType 1Arg Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Module.GetType 1Arg Example/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Module.GetType 1Arg Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Module.GetType 1Arg Example/VB/class1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 `throwOnError` 参数仅影响找不到该类型时所发生的情况。The `throwOnError` parameter affects only what happens when the type is not found. 它不会影响可能引发的任何其他异常。It does not affect any other exceptions that might be thrown. 特别是，如果找到该类型但无法加载，则 即使为，也可能引发该类型 `throwOnError` `false` 。In particular, if the type is found but cannot be loaded, can be thrown even if `throwOnError` is `false`. > [!NOTE] > 如果已将该类型转发给另一个程序集，则此方法仍将返回该程序集。If the type has been forwarded to another assembly, it is still returned by this method. 有关类型转发的信息，请参阅 [公共语言运行时中的类型转发](/dotnet/standard/assembly/type-forwarding)。For information on type forwarding, see [Type Forwarding in the Common Language Runtime](/dotnet/standard/assembly/type-forwarding). 可以使用从特定模块中检索类型 。A type can be retrieved from a specific module using . 对包含清单的模块调用将不会搜索整个程序集。Calling on the module that contains the manifest will not search the entire assembly. 若要从程序集中检索某一类型，而不考虑它所在的模块，则必须调用 。To retrieve a type from an assembly, regardless of which module it is in, you must call . ## Examples 下面的示例显示指定模块中的类型的名称。The following example displays the name of a type in the specified module. `throwOnError`和 `ignoreCase` 参数被指定为 `false` 。The `throwOnError` and `ignoreCase` parameters are specified as `false`. remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReflectionTypeLoadException` 是一个特殊的负载异常。`ReflectionTypeLoadException` is a special load exception. `ReflectionTypeLoadException.Types`属性包含已在模块中定义并加载的类型的数组。The `ReflectionTypeLoadException.Types` property contains the array of types that were defined in the module and were loaded. 此数组可能包含一些 null 值。This array may contain some null values. `ReflectionTypeLoadException.LoaderExceptions`属性是一个异常数组，表示加载程序引发的异常。The `ReflectionTypeLoadException.LoaderExceptions` property is an array of exceptions that represent the exceptions that were thrown by the loader. 类数组中的孔与异常一起排列。The holes in the class array line up with the exceptions. 例如，如果某个类的类初始值设定项在加载时引发了异常， `TargetInvocationException` 则会将其存储在数组的相应元素中 `LoaderExceptions` 。For example, if the class initializers of one of the classes throws an exception while it is being loaded, a `TargetInvocationException` is stored in the corresponding element of the `LoaderExceptions` array. > [!NOTE] > 如果类型已转发给另一个程序集，则它不会包含在返回的数组中。If a type has been forwarded to another assembly, it is not included in the returned array. 有关类型转发的信息，请参阅 [公共语言运行时中的类型转发](/dotnet/standard/assembly/type-forwarding)。For information on type forwarding, see [Type Forwarding in the Common Language Runtime](/dotnet/standard/assembly/type-forwarding).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要解析 `MethodSpec` 其签名包含元素类型或的元数据 `ELEMENT_TYPE_VAR` 标记 `ELEMENT_TYPE_MVAR` ，请使用 方法重载，这允许你提供必要的上下文。To resolve a metadata token for a `MethodSpec` whose signature contains element type `ELEMENT_TYPE_VAR` or `ELEMENT_TYPE_MVAR`, use the method overload, which allows you to supply the necessary context. 也就是说，当你为依赖泛型类型的泛型类型参数和/或嵌入了标记的泛型方法的方法解析元数据标记时，必须使用允许提供这些类型参数的重载。That is, when you are resolving a metadata token for a method that depends on the generic type parameters of the generic type and/or the generic method in which the token is embedded, you must use the overload that allows you to supply those type parameters. > [!NOTE] > 有关元数据令牌的信息，请参阅公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档，尤其是 "第二部分：元数据定义和语义"。Information about metadata tokens can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 文档在线提供;请参阅 MSDN 上的 [Ecma c # 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) 和 [标准 ecma-335-公共语言基础结构 (CLI) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) 在 ECMA 网站上。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the ECMA Web site. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法的两个重载 来解析泛型和非泛型上下文中的调用站点的元数据标记。The following example shows how to use the two overloads of the method to resolve metadata tokens from call sites in generic and non-generic contexts. 此代码示例定义了两种泛型类型， `G1` 并 `G2` (`G1(Of Tg1)` 和 `G2(Of Tg2)` Visual Basic) ，其中每个类型都有一个泛型方法。The code example defines two generic types, `G1` and `G2` (`G1(Of Tg1)` and `G2(Of Tg2)` in Visual Basic), each of which has a generic method. `G1` 还具有一个使用类型参数作为参数的非泛型方法 `Tg1` 。`G1` also has a non-generic method that uses the type parameter `Tg1` for its parameter. `GM2`类型中的泛型方法 `G2` 包含若干方法调用：The generic method `GM2` in type `G2` contains several method calls: - 情况1：调用泛型方法 `GM1` ，并使用的类型参数 `G2` `GM2` 作为类型参数。Case 1: The generic method `GM1` is called, using the type parameters of `G2` and `GM2` as the type arguments. 换言之，被调用方法的参数类型将取决于用于从的类型定义构造封闭式泛型类型的类型 `G2` 。In other words, the parameter types of the called method will depend on the types that are used to construct a closed generic type from the type definition for `G2`. - 情况2：调用了非泛型方法 `M1` 。Case 2: The non-generic method `M1` is called. 此方法的参数使用定义类型的类型参数，该类型参数 `G1` 将在此示例中由封闭类型的类型参数替换 `G2` 。The parameter of this method uses the type parameter of the defining type, `G1`, which is replaced in this case by the type parameter of the enclosing type, `G2`. - 情况3：调用泛型方法 `GM1` ， 并 分别为泛型类型和泛型方法的类型参数指定和。Case 3: The generic method `GM1` is called, specifying and for the type arguments of the generic type and the generic method, respectively. 此方法调用不依赖于封闭类型或方法的类型参数。This method call does not depend on the type parameters of the enclosing type or method. - 情况4：调用类的非泛型方法 `M1` `Example` 。Case 4: The non-generic method `M1` of the `Example` class is called. 此方法调用不依赖于封闭类型或方法的类型参数。This method call does not depend on the type parameters of the enclosing type or method. 此外，该示例还定义了非泛型 `Example` 类。In addition, the example defines the non-generic `Example` class. 此类具有 `M` 调用泛型方法的方法：This class has a method `M` that makes a call to a generic method: - 情况5：调用泛型方法 `GM1` ， 并 分别为泛型类型和泛型方法的类型参数指定和。Case 5: The generic method `GM1` is called, specifying and for the type arguments of the generic type and the generic method, respectively. 此方法的上下文没有封闭泛型类型或泛型方法。The context for this method has no enclosing generic type or generic method. 对于每种情况，该示例首先构造一个 表示被调用方法的，然后使用方法重载解析该标记 ，方法是使用 和 方法获取 `genericTypeArguments` 和参数的值 `genericMethodArguments` 。For each case, the example first constructs a that represents the called method, and then resolves the token using the method overload, using the and methods to get the values for the `genericTypeArguments` and `genericMethodArguments` parameters. 此方法适用于所有情况，因为方法 为非泛型上下文返回。This technique works in all cases, because the methods return for non-generic contexts. 该示例将解析的 与构造的进行比较 。The example compares the resolved with the constructed . 然后，该示例尝试使用 方法重载来解析令牌。The example then attempts to use the method overload to resolve the token. 这适用于3、4和5情况，因为方法调用不依赖于一般上下文。This works in cases 3, 4, and 5, because the method calls do not depend on the generic context. 在案例1和2中，引发异常，因为没有足够的信息来解析令牌。In cases 1 and 2, an exception is thrown because there is insufficient information to resolve the token. 元数据标记值硬编码为枚举。The metadata token values are hard-coded as an enumeration. 如果更改此代码示例，则可能会更改标记值。If you change this code example, the token values are likely to change. 若要确定新的标记值，请编译代码并将 Ildasm.exe 与 **/TOKENS** 选项一起使用来检查程序集。To determine the new token values, compile the code and use Ildasm.exe with the **/TOKENS** option to examine the assembly. 可以在调用点找到标记。The tokens can be found at the points of call. 将新值插入到枚举中，然后重新编译该示例。Insert the new values into the enumeration, and recompile the example. Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the ECMA Web site. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法的两个重载 来解析泛型和非泛型上下文中的调用站点的元数据标记。The following example shows how to use the two overloads of the method to resolve metadata tokens from call sites in generic and non-generic contexts. 此代码示例定义了两个泛型类型， `G1` `G2` 每个泛型类型都有一个泛型方法。The code example defines two generic types, `G1` and `G2`, each of which has a generic method. `G1` 还具有一个使用类型参数作为参数的非泛型方法 `Tg1` 。`G1` also has a non-generic method that uses the type parameter `Tg1` for its parameter. `GM2`类型中的泛型方法 `G2` 包含若干方法调用：The generic method `GM2` in type `G2` contains several method calls: - 情况1：调用泛型方法 `GM1` ，并使用的类型参数 `G2` `GM2` 作为类型参数。Case 1: The generic method `GM1` is called, using the type parameters of `G2` and `GM2` as the type arguments. 换言之，被调用方法的参数类型将取决于用于从的类型定义构造封闭式泛型类型的类型 `G2` 。In other words, the parameter types of the called method will depend on the types that are used to construct a closed generic type from the type definition for `G2`. - 情况2：调用了非泛型方法 `M1` 。Case 2: The non-generic method `M1` is called. 此方法的参数使用定义类型的类型参数，该类型参数 `G1` 将在此示例中由封闭类型的类型参数替换 `G2` 。The parameter of this method uses the type parameter of the defining type, `G1`, which is replaced in this case by the type parameter of the enclosing type, `G2`. - 情况3：调用泛型方法 `GM1` ， 并 分别为泛型类型和泛型方法的类型参数指定和。Case 3: The generic method `GM1` is called, specifying and for the type arguments of the generic type and the generic method, respectively. 此方法调用不依赖于封闭类型或方法的类型参数。This method call does not depend on the type parameters of the enclosing type or method. - 情况4：调用类的非泛型方法 `M1` `Example` 。Case 4: The non-generic method `M1` of the `Example` class is called. 此方法调用不依赖于封闭类型或方法的类型参数。This method call does not depend on the type parameters of the enclosing type or method. 此外，该示例还定义了非泛型 `Example` 类。In addition, the example defines the non-generic `Example` class. 此类具有对 `M` 泛型方法的调用的方法。This class has a method `M` that makes a call to a generic method. - 情况5：调用泛型方法 `GM1` ， 并 分别为泛型类型和泛型方法的类型参数指定和。Case 5: The generic method `GM1` is called, specifying and for the type arguments of the generic type and the generic method, respectively. 此方法的上下文没有封闭泛型类型或泛型方法。The context for this method has no enclosing generic type or generic method. 对于每种情况，该示例首先构造一个 表示被调用方法的，然后使用方法重载解析该标记 ，方法是使用 和 方法获取 `genericTypeArguments` 和参数的值 `genericMethodArguments` 。For each case, the example first constructs a that represents the called method, and then resolves the token using the method overload, using the and methods to get the values for the `genericTypeArguments` and `genericMethodArguments` parameters. 此方法适用于所有情况，因为方法 为非泛型上下文返回。This technique works in all cases, because the methods return for non-generic contexts. 该示例将解析的 与构造的进行比较 。The example compares the resolved with the constructed . 然后，该示例尝试使用 方法重载来解析令牌。The example then attempts to use the method overload to resolve the token. 这适用于3、4和5情况，因为方法调用不依赖于一般上下文。This works in cases 3, 4, and 5, because the method calls do not depend on the generic context. 在案例1和2中，引发异常，因为没有足够的信息来解析令牌。In cases 1 and 2, an exception is thrown because there is insufficient information to resolve the token. 元数据标记值硬编码为枚举。The metadata token values are hard-coded as an enumeration. 如果更改此代码示例，则可能会更改标记值。If you change this code example, the token values are likely to change. 若要确定新的标记值，请编译代码并将 Ildasm.exe 与 **/TOKENS** 选项一起使用来检查程序集。To determine the new token values, compile the code and use Ildasm.exe with the **/TOKENS** option to examine the assembly. 可以在调用点找到标记。The tokens can be found at the points of call. 将新值插入到枚举中，然后重新编译该示例。Insert the new values into the enumeration, and recompile the example. [!code-csharp[Module.MethodResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Module.MethodResolve/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Module.MethodResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Module.MethodResolve/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要解析的元数据标记（ `TypeSpec` 其签名包含 `ELEMENT_TYPE_VAR` 或 `ELEMENT_TYPE_MVAR` ），请使用 方法重载，这允许你提供必要的上下文。To resolve a metadata token for a `TypeSpec` whose signature contains `ELEMENT_TYPE_VAR` or `ELEMENT_TYPE_MVAR`, use the method overload, which allows you to supply the necessary context. 也就是说，当你为依赖于泛型类型的泛型类型参数和/或嵌入了标记的泛型方法的类型的元数据标记进行解析时，必须使用允许提供这些类型参数的重载。That is, when you are resolving a metadata token for a type that depends on the generic type parameters of the generic type and/or the generic method in which the token is embedded, you must use the overload that allows you to supply those type parameters. > [!NOTE] > 有关元数据令牌的信息，请参阅公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档，尤其是 "第二部分：元数据定义和语义"。Information about metadata tokens can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 文档在线提供;请参阅 MSDN 上的 [Ecma c # 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) 和 [标准 ecma-335-公共语言基础结构 (CLI) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) 在 ECMA 网站上。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the ECMA Web site.
